Articles.Content:
For those who don't know about it, Scratch (https://scratch.mit.edu/) is a free online visual programming application, designed by MIT students. It is a very good beginning to programming, and I'm on it as H_Programmings, here: https://scratch.mit.edu/users/H_Programmings/

I've made some projects, which I'm somewhat proud of, my favorite is this Asteroids clone: https://scratch.mit.edu/projects/10915483/?fromexplore=true

Please post your projects on scratch!
YEARS ago, I made tons of these username was Javster too.
